mapper.select: select * from rent_history r, locker l where history_index = #{historyIndex} and r.locker_id = l.locker_id
mapper.insert: insert into review(review_num, user_code, history_index, locker_id, content, score) values(review_num.nextval, #{userCode}, #{historyIndex}, #{lockerId}, #{content}, #{score})
mapper.select: select r.*, l.locker_image, l.locker_title, h.rent_start, h.rent_end from review r, locker l, rent_history h where l.locker_id = r.locker_id and r.history_index = h.history_index and r.review_num = #{reviewNum}
